title: Shutterbugs
description: It is the only photogaphy club of DDU. Shutterbugs organizes various workshops and tours for photography. Put the photographer in you to test by joining this club and keep Shuttering!

title: Samvaad
description: Samvaad, the first communication club of our University is a platform to bring up the hidden speaker residing inside you. Samvaad conducts various events and activities which help students to develop their soft skills and face the social and corporate world.

title: Electoral Literacy Program
description: The NSS Spandan Student Body, an active participant of the Electoral Literacy Club from Dharmsinh Desai University organized Electoral Literacy Program for awareness regarding registration of students eligible as voters.

title: Malgadi
description: Malgadi is a start-up run by students of our University. It provides students with engineering text and reference books and electronic equipment at reasonable rates. It also organizes technical workshops and seminars.

title: The Reader's community
description: The Readers’ Community is for the avid readers of our University. It is for all those who love to explore the world of books and want to develop a habit of reading.

title: Decibel
description: This is the go-to club for all music lovers. Decibel organizes jamming sessions and workshops that focus on singing and musical skills.

title: NSS Spandan
description: NSS-DDU is a social awareness club. It organizes visits, trips, activities and campaigns to raise awareness on several issues. It is also well known for its attempts at breaking Guinness records and has succeeded quite a few times!

title: Independence Day
description: Join us as we celerate our 74th Independence Day.

title: Video Making Competition
description: On this independence day, express your love for India through the art of video-editing through DDU Connect’s video editing contest! The videos created by the participants will be posted on @dduconnect’s Instagram handle. A winner will be selected by (enter details of judge). But that’s not all! Students will be able to vote for their favourite video on dduconnect’s website and app! Get registered on the website now and showcase your skills! Further details will be provided to participants once they are registered.

title: Outside My Window
description: We all know there's always a beautiful view having natural topography just a window view away. A creative photographer can capture it from different perspective. Share your photographs in the link given below. Landscape | Flowers | Nature | Waterfalls | Sky | Rainfall Theme :- Outside my window. Submit your entries on : bit.ly/omwphotography2020

title: The Virtual Discourse
description: Do you'll wish to have an intellectual discussion with your batchmates on current trends and wish to reignite the flames of patriotism within you? If yes, then fasten your seatbelts and let your thoughts run free on this Independence day, as we are back with a brand new event, 'The Virtual Discourse : Where Thoughts Course the Path to the Future.'Topics: 1. National Education Policy 2020. 2. Has Twitter become a self proclaimed court of justice? 3. Growing prominence of India in global market. Date: 15/08/2020 Time: 5:30 p.m. onwards Register at: https://bit.ly/samvaad_TheVirtualDiscourse

title: The Independence day
description: NSS invites you to be a part of Independence day celebration 2020. Here's a way to show your love for the country. [1] ESSAY competition. [2] ELOCUTION competition. [3] RANGOLI competition. [4] PATRIOTIC SONG competition.Submit your entries here : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdC8eBjZszyQ299-i3tFupnZqHOBr-1Fsb6NDecWimiJOwyew/viewform
